## k8s.makeClusterInfo() function

Make a [k8s.ClusterInfo](./cloud.k8s.clusterinfo.md) object suitable for use with k8s resources

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function makeClusterInfo(options: MakeClusterInfoOptions): Promise<ClusterInfo>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>MakeClusterInfoOptions</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<ClusterInfo>`

A [k8s.ClusterInfo](./cloud.k8s.clusterinfo.md) object.

## Remarks

This function will take a set of options and generate a [k8s.ClusterInfo](./cloud.k8s.clusterinfo.md) object that contains the kubeconfig, registryUrl for private images, and any other relevant information for the cluster

See [k8s.MakeClusterInfoOptions](./cloud.k8s.makeclusterinfooptions.md) for information on how the information is computed.
